privacy.seoDescription: Learn how Yeltu Agency LLC collects, uses and protects your personal data in line with modern privacy and GDPR-inspired principles.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how Yeltu Agency LLC (“Yeltu Agency”, “we”) collects, uses and protects personal information when you visit our website or contact us.
privacy.content1: By using our website or contacting us, you agree that we may process your personal data as described in this Privacy Policy.
privacy.content2: We are a digital agency based in Baku, Azerbaijan.
privacy.content3: We may collect your name, email, phone number, message content, and analytics data.
privacy.content4: We use this data to contact you, improve our services, and maintain security.
privacy.content5: We use cookies to remember preferences and measure traffic.
privacy.content6: We take appropriate steps to protect personal data.
privacy.content7: You may request access or deletion of your data at any time by emailing info@yeltu.com.
privacy.content8: We may update this policy from time to time.
privacy.contactText: For any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, contact us at info@yeltu.com.

terms.seoDescription: Read the Terms & Conditions governing your use of the Yeltu Agency website.
terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: These Terms & Conditions govern your use of the Yeltu Agency website.
terms.content1: By accessing this website, you agree to these Terms.
terms.content2: Information on this website is for general informational purposes only.
terms.content3: All materials are owned by Yeltu Agency LLC.
terms.content4: We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation.
terms.content5: We are not responsible for third-party links.
terms.content6: We may update these Terms at any time.
terms.content7: Disputes are governed by the laws of Azerbaijan.

cookies.seoDescription: Learn how Yeltu Agency LLC uses cookies and how you can manage them.
cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how we use cookies.
cookies.content1: Cookies are small text files stored on your device.
cookies.content2: We use necessary, analytics, and marketing cookies.
cookies.content3: Third-party services like Google Analytics may use cookies.
cookies.content4: You can control cookies through browser settings or our preferences page.
cookies.content5: We may update this Cookie Policy at any time.

cookiePrefs.seoDescription: Manage your cookie preferences for analytics and marketing.
cookiePrefs.title: Cookie Preferences
cookiePrefs.intro: You can control which non-essential cookies we use.
cookiePrefs.necessaryText: These are required for the site to function.
cookiePrefs.analyticsText: Help us understand performance and usage.
cookiePrefs.marketingText: Help us measure campaigns and show relevant ads.
cookiePrefs.statusSaved: Your cookie preferences have been saved.

cookieBanner.message: We use cookies to improve your experience, analyze traffic, and provide personalized content.
